reviewText: Enjoyed this movie very much.  To think that a 19 year old boy decided to take in boys so they would have a home is unbelievable.  He was definitely a very special person.
Very nice movie for the whole family.
We love this movie on the story of Tom Butterfield..  We saw this years ago and are so haoopy we finally got it.  Thank you so much.
A movie made in my hometown featuring a lot of my friends.  I was still too ugly to get a part in it, but still the closest I ever got to Michelle Pfeifer!
Awesome movie filmed in my hometown Marshall Mo. Used lots of local ppl for parts too. My Uncle is in it several times.
This is a great holiday movie! I had seen this years ago and finally bought it - the fact that it's a true story makes it even better.
Great product.  Came very Quick.  Highly Recommend.
The movie is great but the stars name is not on the cover, had a heck of a time finding it.
